xo=[1980	1981	1982	1983	1984	1985	1986	1987	1988	1989	1990	1991	1992	1993	1994	1995	1996	1997	1998	1999	2000	2001	2002	2003	2004	2005	2006	2007	2008	2009	2010	2011	2012	2013	2014	2015	2016	2017	2018	2019];
yo=[441.5484516	572.4654464	653.545545	826.8946565	1035.258705	1371.761925	3122.848914	3842.418915	4083.02646	4875.558252	5820.377178	6405.800667	6911.731692	7560.615807	8956.873008	9888.937842	12063.07464	13917.11488	16917.19441	19917.27393	22557.46398	22802.1114	23504.07308	30784.36377	38064.65447	39548.07309	40323.4059	45816.62705	57551.04608	65904.49151	69658.89346	72159.08906	73994.79689	76068.19368	81087.37333	83444.28837	84732.82397	85849.51433	89753.39146	90226.31625
];%scatter(xo,yo);
a=6/46;
A=158700*4;
x=-8/a:1:14/a;
X=x+2026
t=exp(1).^(-x.*a);
y=A.*t./(1.+t).^2;
K=0.7;
Y=y.*(x<=0)+(A.* (exp(1).^(-x.*a.*K)) ./(1.+ (exp(1).^(-x.*a.*K)) ).^2).*(x>0);
plot(xo,yo,'bo',X,Y,'r-');
